channel.title: Party Room! Anyone know how to fix?
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to fix the party room, so u pull the lever and balloons fall from the ceiling, with the items from the chest beside lever? and to be able to put stuff in the chest? If anyone knows how to fix this could you please post here? I would greatly apreciate it. I looked on the tut sorm and couldnt find it.
THX :D :D
